text: John Fortune (30 June 1939 – 31 December 2013) was a British satirist, comedian, writer and actor. He was best known for his work with John Bird and Rory Bremner on the television series Bremner, Bird and Fortune. He studied at Bristol Cathedral School and King's College, Cambridge, where he met John Bird. Fortune died from leukemia,John Fortune dies aged 74 at the age of 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * John Fortune at Vivienne Clore * Bremner, Bird and Fortune, "Best Political Satire -Television, 2003" – Political Studies Association Awards 2003 * Bird and Fortune: A Life in Television BAFTA filmed event, March 2009 Category:1939 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Bristol Category:Comedians from Bristol Category:Deaths from leukemia Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English television writers
title: John Fortune
